core/alerts/alert-error:
{{#if dismissable}}×{{/if}}
{{#if message}} {{{message}}} {{else}} {{{this}}} {{/if}}
core/forms/form-contact-us: {{#if forms.contact.error}} {{> core/alerts/alert-error message=forms.contact.error dismissable=true}} {{/if}} {{#if forms.contact.name}} {{> core/forms/common/text label=(lang 'core.contact.full_name') name="contact_fullname" id="contact_fullname" required="true" prefill=(lang 'core.contact.full_name_placeholder') value=customer.name}} {{/if}} {{#if forms.contact.phone}} {{> core/forms/common/text label=(lang 'core.contact.phone') name="contact_phone" id="contact_phone" prefill=(lang 'core.contact.phone_placeholder') value=customer.phone}} {{/if}} {{> core/forms/common/email label=(lang 'core.contact.email') name="contact_email" id="contact_email" required="true" prefill=(lang 'core.contact.email_placeholder') value=customer.email}} {{#if forms.contact.order}} {{> core/forms/common/text label=(lang 'core.contact.order') name="contact_orderno" id="contact_orderno" prefill=(lang 'core.contact.order_placeholder')}} {{/if}} {{#if forms.contact.company}} {{> core/forms/common/text label=(lang 'core.contact.company') name="contact_companyname" id="contact_companyname" prefill=(lang 'core.contact.company_placeholder')}} {{/if}} {{#if forms.contact.rma}} {{> core/forms/common/text label=(lang 'core.contact.rma') name="contact_rma" id="contact_rma" prefill=(lang 'core.contact.rma_placeholder')}} {{/if}} {{#if forms.contact.shop}} {{> core/forms/common/text label=(lang 'core.contact.shop') name="contact_shop" id="contact_shop" prefill=(lang 'core.contact.shop_placeholder')}} {{/if}} {{> core/forms/common/multiline label=(lang 'core.contact.question') name="contact_question" id="contact_question" required=true prefill=(lang 'core.contact.question_placeholder') rows=4}} {{{forms.contact.recaptcha.markup}}}
